website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, versatile charger with non-slip especially intended for AirPods.
pros: Three charging modes support everything from iPhone to Galaxy note to AirPods
Top and bottom are equipped with non-slip rubber ring

customer_reviews.title: Works great and priced awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great and priced awesome! Also charges cats. My cat has full power after just 5 minutes sitting on this.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bila Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Just plugged in and works like a charm consistently with my iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and no surprises..Exactly as advertised. Just plugged in and works like a charm consistently with my iPhone 8. I am very satisfied with this product and would recommend to anyone looking for a similar product. Also it charges fine with my phone in a wireless compatible case. So all aspects covered from my perspective. Great product. For the manufacturer it would be great if they could provide a bit more lengthier charge cable...feel it is short.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I use it for overnight charging of my iPhone X. There is a small indicator light in red when not in use and green when charging. The pad on top is non slip so that the phone stays in place. You do need to make sure that it it lined up properly in order to receive a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Yoyo

customer_reviews.title: ... my husbands iPhone X for Christmas and it’s works great. It chargers efficiently
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands iPhone X for Christmas and it’s works great. It chargers efficiently, is light weight, and does not take up a lot of space. The bottom allows is to sit near the edge of his nightstand and not fall off when he grabs the phone. My only problem is that I should’ve bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Revised. Originally the charger stopped working after only 4 months while the charging light indicator flickers. It ended up being the power adapter that I used, switches to another and the charger was fine. Great price, reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Peejayman

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with iPhone8Plus
customer_reviews.text: Good price, works really well.. No complains regarding charging my iPhone8 Plus. I basically put my iPhone on it on my bedside table before sleep and pick up in the morning. Never notice my iPhone8 Plus being hot, neither the charging station.. Great product for the price.. Regarding how fast it charges I can't tell because of my use case, it charges during the whole night.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Silva

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Started using this item 3 days ago. So far, it has done a great job of charging my iPhone X. The charging speed isn’t the quickest, but it’s certainly decent enough. It has no problem charging through my phone case. I will update this if anything negative happens.
customer_reviews.author: Harry S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger!! I was kinda skeptical about these actually working...but it’s great!! I have an iphone8 plus, and it charges it good. It’s very, very easy to work. I did take off my phone case to charge though because the back of the case is a wallet, and the directions do say not to charge with cards that have the strip on it. But you just put the phone on top of it and when the light is green it’s charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes Boring Is Great
customer_reviews.text: Nothing too exciting here. It has a nice rubber top, a quick-responding LED indicator, solid build, and a simple micro USB connection. It's small and light. I dig the small part since it's easy to keep on my desk without getting in the way. And best of all, no goofy logos or "FAST CHARGE" branding plastered on it. This charger keeps it classy. It doesn't need your attention. It's happy to just silently charge your devices all day long. In this fast-growing segment, that's under-appreciated. So raise a glass to the Yootech Wireless Charging Pad. Because we need more quiet objects in our lives.
customer_reviews.author: Kiel Oleson

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Even with my UAG Trooper case.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this a day now but works great so far. It actually works perfectly with my UAG Trooper case on my iPhone X. (UAG stated the case wouldn’t work with wireless chargers because of it being a thicker card case). Very happy with this charger!
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: It works really well with my Samsung galaxy s7 edge . I have an otterbox case and it's able to charge while wearing it. Affordable and seems to work just as well as the name brands
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M.

customer_reviews.title: Use it at work everyday, solid charge
customer_reviews.text: Works great, not as fast as wire but the freedom to grab and go is great. Also lessens the wires on the table as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So many of the “iPhone compatible” cords’ plug thingies are too short to charge my phone unless the cover is removed, so I ordered this when I realized my iPhone 8 could DO wireless charging. So glad I did! It works great! Yeah, it may be a little slower than charging with the lightning cords, and sometimes (but rarely) I need to re-position it to be in the correct charging spot, but it still charges like I need it to- and WITHOUT REMOVING THE CASE. For the price (less that $13), it’s a total win. I’m very happy with my new wireless charger.
customer_reviews.author: amyflies

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS.  IT DO HIES NOT WORK AT ALL AFTER JUST A SHOR TIME
customer_reviews.text: During the first month it changed my samsung phone but really slowly. It would take 5 hours or more to complete ther charge. Now it will not change at all and my phone message says the charge is slower than the ability to charge. I have only used it a few times because itwas so slow wheni it did work. I would have returned it sooner when i could but did not use it much and when i did it did not work. Now Amazon will not let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem item.
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with two units but Yootech contacted me within minutes to fix it. EDIT: I had a problem with 2 out of 3, I contacted YooTech and they promised to send me a replacement. A month later I write to them asking for a status and I got a broken English apology and a new promise to fulfill. Two weeks later I get only one of the two chargers, still down 1 out of 3 but I do not care anymore, these were gifts and I ended up feeling terrible for taking a chance with Chinese products for family. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great charger for both iPhone X and Samsung Note 8
customer_reviews.text: Great charger for both iPhone X and Samsung Note 8.I was pleasantly surprised at how well this charger works considering it's low cost. I ordered 3 more so I could have one in the office and bedroom. The phone does get slightly warm when charging- I read that is normal. I found that the phone is not warm if I leave it on the charger overnight. I assume that after the battery reaches 100%, the charger is no no longer active. This charger is small and takes up little room. It does have rubberized feet which keep it from getting tipped. Highly recommend.,
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my iPhone X. I use it ever night. Highly recommend it for an inexpensive wireless charging option.
customer_reviews.author: Heli Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, effective wireless charger
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, effective wireless charging pad that works well with my iPhone 8 Plus and iPhone X. It is 1 amp out so not rapid, but it is reasonable charge rate. I like this by the nightstand or desk to charge at night. I use an Anker model that is inclined to charge and recognize my face during the day at my office desk. Note: the description is wrong, the model that says it has a lightning cord is not lightning, it is micro-USB. You supply your own charger. It is easy to use with a red and green LED light. It is not fussy about where you place the phone on the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful7

customer_reviews.title: Works better than the more expensive one...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this charger to leave at work and spent $26.99 for a snazzier looking glass one for home bedside (TOZO). This Yootech works much better. It connects instantly when I set my phone down. With the glass one, I have to slide the phone a bit to get it to connect - then hope I don't bump the phone or charger on nightstand. The ping-pinging and straining from bed to see if the IPhone X's TEENY TINY little lightning charge symbol is lit is annoying. Phone doesn't slide (drop charge) *AT ALL* on the Yootech. No special c-spot. I'll probably buy a second to replace the glass one. No problems at all connecting through the Spigen Ultra Hybrid phone case.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: For 12 bucks, this charger is perfect for iPhone 8 & 8+
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for 12 bucks! Does not come with AC adapter so be sure to use a quality adapter for best charging. I use on both an iPhone 8 and iPhone 8+ with cases installed. These cases are not what I would call thin and the wireless charger works great. Quicker charge time than anticipated as well. One thing I did notice is that when you remove the phone from the charger, the rear of the phone has a certain "electronic" smell too it. Not sure what is causing this but thought it was worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: ASUengineer

customer_reviews.title: great wireless charger
customer_reviews.text: Hubs and I just got new iPhones (8 and XR) and these are our first wireless charging capable phones so thought would give wireless charger a chance. It is weird to not use a cord but its nice. I have it on the night stand so when I'm done with my bedtime surfing I just roll over and set it down on the charger, green light comes on and boom I'm off to dream land. No more searching around on the floor for the cord and hoping that the monster under the bed doesn't reach out and grab my arm and pull me under. So not only does it charge my phone its keeping me safe from the monsters! haha
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Inexpensive & quick charge!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a super techy person. Id had this gadget in my Amazon cart for weeks before buying it. I kinda felt it was an unnecessary expense as I'm pretty frugal with my money; however I won an Amazon gift card & thought I'd give it a try. I actually love it! I sit it on my nightstand & it charges much quicker than my apple cord. I thought when I bought it, it would just be the charging pad, but it comes with the cord too. You just need an adapter that plugs into the wall. I have plenty laying around from old phone chargers so I got to try it out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Looks Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless charger! Looks very nice and charges my IPhone X well! I do not have any trouble with placement for it to start charging and looks nice on my office desk and bedroom. I highly recommend this wireless charger over others and save some $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great ... instructions say to take phone out of case wgen charging!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. 4 stars because instructions say to not use while iPhone is in any cover!! What ?? Warning says it may get very hot. Which it promptly did. Yikes! But after a couple of uses it doesn't get hot anymore (iPhone or charger) even with a case on my phone. It works great but I can't give 5 stars for something that warns against using it the way that the majority of users would. Note for sensitive sleeps: The red LEF changes to green when charging and in a dark room it can seem bright. So I turned the charger around to point the light away from the bed.
customer_reviews.author: WittiCrew

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, WORKS GREAT, CHARGES FAST!!!
customer_reviews.text: The iPhone X is the first cell phone I’ve owned with wireless charging. This charger works great, and charges quickly!!! It’s so much easier than having to plug it in! I still have to plug my iPad in. Maybe my next iPad Mini will have wireless charging too. I hope!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L

customer_reviews.title: I mainly bought this as an extra charger for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this as an extra charger for my wife. However, around the time I ordered this I had to get a new phone. I learned that my new phone was capable of wireless charging. I didn't want to spend a lot of money and noticed the positive reviews this product received. My wife loves her new charge and primarily uses it to charge her phone while sleeping. My use has been limited but when I do I notice I have to take my phone out of its Otter Box to get a decent charge. And the phone must be aligned properly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R Chambliss

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, hard to position correctly.
customer_reviews.text: This was ok. I had to position my phone just right or it wouldn’t charge. Sometimes it would take a few minutes Before it would finally start charging. I have a thicker case that holds credit cards and often would not charge if it was too full. I would have to take stuff out in order to charge it. It’s more of a hassle than it was worth so I would rather just use a cord charger. I Purchased this thinking it would be a lot easier and found that it wasn’t. But it worked just fine if I didn’t have a case on my phone
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable charger!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charger that does just what you need it to do. I use it in my office to keep my phone charged while I am working and not using it. So convenient to just be able to pick it up and go without all of the plugging and unplugging. Charger cord is long enough to reach floor plug. You need your own usb plug as it comes with the charger plate and the cord, but not the plug. As others have said, not lighting fast, but fast enough that I can go from 80% to 100% in about an hour. Works great for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: S. Motley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of fishing for the end of my charger cord beside my bed. This thing is great! Just pop the phone on top and presto! I’m not sure about how fast it charges because I only use it at night. It’s always at 100% in the morning. I read that the red light turns green when it’s connected to your phone and changes back to red when fully charged. Mine stays green the whole time, but my phone says 100% in the morning and I have plenty of juice left at the end of the day. The only problem is I wish i had gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi 42

customer_reviews.title: Works with thick cases.
customer_reviews.text: Works and as no problems. I purchased 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Paratus

customer_reviews.title: A must have for wireless charging!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. Easy peasy to lay down my phone on it (I have an iPhone 8 with a case on it), and it always charged. The indicator light turning green to indicate charging is very handy! It charges relatively quick, but nothing unbelievable. It is just so much easier to not have to plug your phone in! Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: einstein1990

customer_reviews.title: Super fast charging
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and so far so good . My sister has a 6s and tried charging her phone on it but couldn’t. I on the other hand, own a 8plus so it works for my phone. Been only using it for 10 minutes however, I’m very impressed. Update : Had to update my review after a couple of days of using this. It was a four star now it's five. It charge my phone very fast with zero issues. I have told all my friends and family about it so they,Lloyd be purchasing their own, and the best thing is it's only $13 compare to the $50 that Apple charge !!!
customer_reviews.author: Albertha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Yes. Yes!! I finally have a wireless charger and i love it. This makes life easier. Sometimes when I’d charge with a cord like a caveman it’s Get in the way. Wouldn’t be long enough. Blah blah blah. If i need to use the phone really quick i just grab it and can easily set it back down. I don’t have to pick up the fallen to the floor old cord and plug in. I just. Set. It. Down. I need this in all the main rooms of the house!! Will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Works good, although I find it kind of annoying that ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, although I find it kind of annoying that I have to take my credit cards out of my phone case when I charge it. I have a case that has a card slot in the back and you don’t charge it with cards between the phone and charger otherwise it messes with the card magnetic strip for when you go to use it. Also, if you have a thicker case on your phone like I do, you kind of have to reposition it a couple times before it starts charging to get it in just the right position.
customer_reviews.author: Daylee

customer_reviews.title: It works for my iPhone X but you gotta place it right.
customer_reviews.text: If I place my phone correctly it’ll charge my iPhone X just fine. But if I place it too high or too low it won’t. I’d say there’s about a 35% margin of error. But I’m not sure what would fix that aside from making the charging pad way bigger. It’s all about where the charging receiver is on the back of the phone. And at least it’s not abnoxiously bright like some others, so I have it on my night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Stoffer

customer_reviews.title: Slow Charge
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen hamsters on wheels produce more electricity and or power than this wireless charger. I am not sure why this is advertised as a iPhone X wireless charger. It probably couldn’t even supply enough power for the worlds smallest LED bulb
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Catura

customer_reviews.title: Working fabulously with LG v30 in plastic case.
customer_reviews.text: It's a testament to quality that I have nothing to say. Plugged it in and it starting charging my LG v30. No problems two weeks later. it's being used by 3-4 family members daily. Only complaint is it is a little light-weight, which we all know makes things feel 'cheap', but this is not a real complaint because I like this product more for being so cheap/affordable. The usb cable it comes with is a bit shorter than I would like, and because of the scant instructions I'm not sure if it will work if I replace it. This hasn't been a issue because I am adaptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product broke two days after use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Dec 13th, received it about two days later and immediately put into moving boxes for about a month. Opened it up two days ago, plugged it in and worked perfectly fine with the Apple Cube (outlet). Now it mysteriously no longer works. Tried new outlets, new cords, no idea. I would return it but I don’t think it’s worth the hassle. Pretty disappointed. My other wireless charger I’ve had for over 3 months now works flawlessly, it’s a shame this one doesn’t follow suit.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bennett

customer_reviews.title: ... for a couple days but so far it works great. It does seem to charge it a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a couple days but so far it works great. It does seem to charge it a little slowly but I keep it by my bed to charge my phone over night so it doesn't bother me that its a little slower.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: FAILED for me.. Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately failed- Night #1 worked perfectly thru an Otterbox defender on an IPHONE X, second night the power to the unit shut off. No light on in the morning, phone only partially charged. I moved to a new USB adapter, night #3 worked again. Night #4 power fail during charging. Night #5 would not even start charging, even after re-plugging into yet another USB adapter. Night #6 it did start charging but the power failed again sometime during the night. No power to the unit in the morning, phone partially charged. Wrote Yootech with details, no response after several days. Sent it back...
customer_reviews.author: Jamazon

customer_reviews.title: I can easily dictate shopping lists and text messages while charging my ...
customer_reviews.text: We keep this one in the kitchen and is so convenient. I just set my phone on it and go about my business. I can pick it up to look up recipes or ingredients and I don’t have to bother with plugging and unplugging over and over. I can easily dictate shopping lists and text messages while charging my phone. It’s a bummer that it doesn’t work with my ring thing attached to my case. So I need to remove it from my case. Maybe it’s the positioning of the ring, idk. Will experiment more when I order a new case.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Slow to charge, which is fine because I used it for overnight charging but it has stopped charging four months from when I received it. Still gives me a green light and phone charging indicator is on, but there’s no increase in battery percentage, even overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: The light isn’t that bright!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase one of these charging mats before and the lights on it were blinding. It became pretty unsightly with all this electrical tape over it, so I changed it out for this one which has a small, single light in the front. I love it and it works! Unfortunately the cord is insanely short, but I used the old cord I had and everything’s working great!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlea

customer_reviews.title: Works just like you want it to
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and is so much easier than having a cord. I have a pop socket on the back of my case, so I was worried I would have to take my phone out of the case every time I needed to charge. But if I rest it on the charger just right, and I can do it without looking now, I can leave it in the case. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TrutstyTrunks Founder

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for a low price
customer_reviews.text: This charger works as expected and described. I don't have to worry about placing my phone just right on it, as long as I get the phone in the right general area on the charger. It doesn't seem to get hot like some of the other wireless chargers I have used.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not with accessories on the phone.
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality but unfortunately I was unable to use them as they could not penetrate an Otterbox defender with a metal plate for vehicle magnetic mount. I’m sure the metal plate is what really prevents it from working, but it’s not something I will take off. I like my magnetic car mount. So I will be charging by wire for now.
customer_reviews.author: StarDude Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Received this charger in the estimated delivery time. I have used it a couple of times so far. It works great, charges my phone way faster than with the plug in. I have the IPhone X. The only thing I would have liked, is for it to come with the wall charger portion, the instructions show the wall adapter but it is not included with the purchase. It does come with the USB cord.
customer_reviews.author: Emilyann F Peinamalie

customer_reviews.title: Great charger!
customer_reviews.text: It was released from the charging cable. Even with the cover in place, it can react quickly and charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: You need to check led if you were able to hit the zone it charges your phone
customer_reviews.text: Overall product is great. But 3 stars because you can place your phone and find it later not charged because it wasn't precisely positioned on the center. Due to triangular shape slight shift can make it lay all night without charges. I would recommend buy the same product but round shape
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two, one broke in a few hours
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered the triangle one. I have had that one for 2 years or so with no issue so when I needed a couple more I reordered. I received round ones instead and while they look nice, they appear to be lower quality. Of the two, one broke within hours. I have a feeling the other won't last much longer. Cheap Chinese junk
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the value
customer_reviews.text: I went with this charger simply because it was inexpensive. I have an iPhone 8 Plus and I can happily say that I have had no issues with it. I actually went back and bought 2 more for friends that asked for one. No need to spend tons of money. This one did the trick
customer_reviews.author: westside chango

customer_reviews.title: The plastic smells like spray paint and is quite strong
customer_reviews.text: It has a very strong smell. The plastic smells like spray paint and is quite strong. The cord could be shorter but it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: This product worked fine. Then it didn't. It just sits in my home office so it wasn't dropped or moved or touched...and it just stopped working one day. I have multiple iPhones as that is part of my work so it was tested on more than one phone. Not sure what happened. It worked fine prior to this.
customer_reviews.author: David Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It sits right near my bed as I sleep and it makes charging extremely easy. I’ve never had an issue with it charging however you cannot just put it down and thing it will start charging. You do have to ensure you have gotten it aligned correctly. That part has led to some confusion when I’ve laid my phone down and it didn’t charge however once I realized what I was doing wrong I’ve had no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lance D Perry

customer_reviews.title: Works with iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Working perfectly with my iPhone X in an Apple case. Does not offer fast charge compatibility, but this is not an issue for a bedside charger. 5W charge speed is sufficient for overnight charging. LED is very subtle. (Not a problem in a dark room while sleeping). Note: the LED shows turns green to indicate charge being applied to the phone, but does not indicate completion of a full charge. (Not an issue for me). Solid for the price. I already have enough chargers, so I don't need to pay a premium for another wall wart. If your charger works well with a lightning cable, it will work well with this pad.
customer_reviews.author: Dapper Shopper

customer_reviews.title: CHARGES PHONE FAST (and with no interference from my bulky phone case)
customer_reviews.text: This is wireless charger is absolutely perfect and at such a great price! I love not having to mess with the USB cord and have it clutter up my nightstand. It charges my phone quickly and my fairly bulky phone case doesn't interfere with its charging capability. I couldn't be happier with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J

customer_reviews.title: Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Price.... and Great Product.. Its a wireless charger, and i love the convenience of this product. I picked up two and placed one in my office and one in the kitchen. I can recommend this product. I use it for an I phone X and i will also be buying more soon
customer_reviews.author: danryll m.

customer_reviews.title: There is a reason this was priced so cheap, because it is
customer_reviews.text: I used this charger for about 6 months and it just stopped. No contact back from the seller, I didn't use it all the time so I can't argue that it was overused. I think its just a poor quality charger period, it was also difficult to line the phone up so it had to be precise every time otherwise if the phone was moved at all, it would disconnect from charging.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Natoli

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very small pad, half the size of my phone, but great charger, doesn’t take up space. Compatible with my thick otter box defender series case even though it’s thicker than the suggested (product manual) 4mm case size limit.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, simple and affordable wireless charger!
customer_reviews.text: There are many chargers on the market, I bought this because of the low price (under $10). It works flawlessly with my Galaxy S7 Edge, just put the phone down, it turns green and the charging starts. The unit is small and uncomplicated, doesn't take up much room on a desk or table, and its basic black design blends in to its surroundings. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what a waste. I would like my money back or at ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, even though it stated that it will charge your phone with the case on, it didn’t not charge my phone with having a case on. So right then it was low key pointless to have since I have to take out my case every time. I thought I would use my regular cable for now and whenever my gf comes over I’ll use this charger. I’ve used a multiple times and now it doesn’t even charge at all... barely just got the charger and barely been using it and it’s already broken... what a waste. I would like my money back or at least having it replaced
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Great at what it’s designed to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device so I don’t have to plug in the lightening cable on my iPhone (difficult to do in the dark). Now when going to bed, I just put my iPhone on the device, verify the battery shows it’s charging and go to sleep. With a case on the iPhone getting the lightening cable plugged in was a chore. I wish the brightness of the led on the device was controllable or just dimmer. Otherwise, I’m very happy. I’ve had the device about 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: TimM@Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this charger for over a month now and it works great. I have the iPhone 8 in a otter box defender case and it works fine and I do not have to take it out of the case. So much easier to just lay it on the charger and not have to reach down and find cords to plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Chris36

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with my iPhone 8. I hadn't realized ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my iPhone 8. I hadn't realized when I purchased, but it comes with a micro-USB to USB cable. Just doesn't include a wall plug. If you have a USB port open somewhere to plug into, you have everything you need when you purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is working great. It is thin and compact, but not too small for the phone. It feels well made, and the rubber feet on the bottom and pad on the top keep everything secure. Charging is fast and simple. For this price, there's no reason not to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn F

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for my iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: This nicely priced wireless charging pad works well with my iPhone 8 even in its case which I was worried about. Have several of them and keep them on desks and such. Noticed that they use a lot of power though, but I just make sure they are on plugs that I disable when not in that room to save energy. Overall good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Product had decent reviews so I decided to try it. I am a read the instructions follow directions kind of person. I have a job where I sleep on when I can so a few hours at a time. More than half of the times I used I woke up to my phone dying. I thought it was something I did so I tried a few different ways. The two times it did charge it took way longer than the regular chord did.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charger, light is not too bright in case ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent charger, light is not too bright in case you have it on your night table, works as expected cable included, note no usb power pack. Its A smaller charger, better for the iPhone 8 or X and not the 8 plus, just my opinion. It does contain a grippy surface on the top to prevent your phone from sliding or getting bumped off.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great- I love to listen to podcasts when I go to sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great- I love to listen to podcasts when I go to sleep and this means I don't have to use a cord splitter since my iphone doesn't have a headphone jack. The only issue is that sometimes my phone gets moved when I sleep if I move the cord and it moves out of the charging position, but that's not a fault of this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: H. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charger!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s so cool! All I have to do is lay my phone on top of this charging pad and my phone immediately starts charging. I don’t have to plug my phone into anything! It provides a quick charge and I can just throw it on the pad. It doesn’t have to be placed a special or certain way. Love it and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jessicag13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great charger, bought it for my mom for Christmas. I plan on getting one for myself!!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bought an iPhone X for my birthday and was excited to get this charger. It doesn’t charge that well, takes much longer than a regular outlet charger and my phone would get really hot when using. When my phone charged with this device the battery died very quick compared to the traditional wya of charging.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Slack

customer_reviews.title: Decent, good for the price. May have a particular orientation for phone placement it prefers.
customer_reviews.text: It works, and typically works well. However, it can decide to be picky about arrangement of the phone. I’ve grabbed my phone in the morning to find it didn’t charge overnight, which can be frustrating. But typically it works well and fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ash6s

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Droid Turbo 2
customer_reviews.text: Works with my Droid Turbo 2, great discreet design and only green or red lights. No annoying bright lights like other wireless chargers. Also, I don't have to take my case off for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Loudog33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This thing is brilliant, can't think of anything I don't like about it. It's grippy and not fussy about how you place the phone. You can just vaguely place the phone at almost any angle on the charger and it detects it fine. Light goes green, the phones pings and off you go. It charges my iphone 8 very quickly indeed. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. S. Young

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because wireless charging has been a new cool way to charge my phone. When i got it, i plugged in and placed my phone on it... Nothing. I tried all the phones in the house and still... Nothing. This product didnt work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Liam A.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger. I keep it on my nightstand next to my bed. There are no bright lights that keep you awake, and it senses the phone really well. I don't need to jack around with trying to get it in just the correct spot for it to work. I've been using it with my Samsung S6 Edge for a couple months now and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Irishminx

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Works for IPhone 8!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just plug and use! Had previously gone with another brand because I wanted white but did not work. So glad I got this one and in black. It blends great on my table, has a rubber top pad that makes it slip proof, no annoying blinking lights, long cord to plug, and super slim! Phone does not get hot and anyway I put it, it starts charging. And the price you can’t beat!!! Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: LeelooTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good Charging Pad until it Quits
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problem with this charging pad. It charges pretty fast. I did find I had to use the AC adapter that came with my iphone. It didn't work with a generic one. *After only 8 months of use this charger suddenly quit. Changed from 5 stars to 3.
customer_reviews.author: JEL

customer_reviews.title: Works well, feels cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Charges my iPhone X just fine. Quality seems a bit lacking, but it wasn’t expensive, I guess you get what you pay for! I would buy it again if it breaks. I got this one specifically because the light on other ones I’ve bought was larger, with this small light in front it’s not too bright while charging on my night stand at night.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it for those devices that support inductive charging
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it does. Just plug it in and away you go. Charges my iPhone 8 through the Otter Box case with no problems. Red light turns green so you know it's working. Highly recommend it for those devices that support inductive charging.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. RobTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this charger
customer_reviews.text: It charges my phone perfectly. I have a iPhone 8 Plus. I recommend this charger. Not sure on how long it takes to get to a fully charged battery, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for the past two years with no issues at all. I keep it next to the bed for overnight charging. It is much slower than hooking to a cable, but for long term stuff it’s really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Works with difficulty
customer_reviews.text: It works, slowly (as advertised). I used it with a Galaxy S6. The problem is that the charging area is VERY small; it takes some effort to line up the phone so that it will charge. I think more expensive brands have a little more wiggle room. But it works, and saved my butt when the charging port on my phone broke, so I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Obsessive

customer_reviews.title: I smile every time I lay my iphone on this pad!!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, charges my iPhone 8 Plus fast!! I haven’t charged my phone with the traditional Apple phone charger since I received this wireless charging pad! So easy and hassle free! I’m hoping this little joy will save me the need of purchasing replacement phone chargers every few months. Needless to say, I am very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: MariaLM

customer_reviews.title: Slow charge
customer_reviews.text: This is overall a really good charger , I bought two of them one for me and one for another person. It’s really convenient when it’s late and dark in the room and you can just place the phone on the pad and you know it’s charging and where the pad is due to the little led light on the front . It is slightly slower than the regular wired charge but it’s somewhat worth the conveinience .
customer_reviews.author: Nick DeLaRosa

customer_reviews.title: Oh how I wanted this to work!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the idea of wireless charging but the technology just doesn't seem to be there yet. This is my second wireless charger for my iPhone X and it was definitely unreliable. Too many times I would wake up to an uncharged phone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Osborne

customer_reviews.title: I love this charger
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger...its so easy to use! I actually plug the USB into my cable box instead of in the wall and I lay my phone down to charge every night and it works perfectly! You have to make sure your phone is settled on the 'sweet spot' so that it charges but its easy to tell because the light turns from red to green when its in the right spot! This charger allows me to use the phone and charge at the same time since the iPhone X has only one input for charging and using earbuds...ugh!
customer_reviews.author: TashBK

customer_reviews.title: Works for iPhone X like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the price. But bought two of them, because I thought it was worth a shot. They are awesome! At least the one that I have opened. I use it for my iPhone X. It is like magic! Love this charger and will buy more in the future. If you are on the fence, just pull the trigger and get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: +If you use your iPhone X around water like I do since it's proofed
customer_reviews.text: +If you use your iPhone X around water like I do since it's proofed, consider switching to wireless for charging: the Lightning cable connectors are very susceptible to corrosion and you can kill them easily by plugging in if still damp. Wireless charging eliminates this risk entirely. +Cost -Sometimes charging alignment needs more than one try but it's not a deal breaker -Doesn't include USB -> Power adapter if you want to use a normal electrical socket instead of USB port.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisC

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Good overall ability. Not good got travel as far as in a car but worked great on my nightstand and hotel nightstand. Also don’t have to worry about pulling cord out of the wall jack. Just set in sweet spot and let it do it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Charger
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger! So simple to use just sit it on the charger and bam its charging. Perfect for those phones with loose connection or just an ease of setting it down. I have 3 little kids and this is nice so they aren't tearing up chargers or even guests that come by then can just set it on the charger and no hassle. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kandi

customer_reviews.title: This works awesome! I keep it on my nightstand next to ...
customer_reviews.text: This works awesome! I keep it on my nightstand next to my bed, and as long as i see the little, unobtrusive green light, I know its charging. I used to have one of the stand up ones, but if the phone moved a little or I bumped my table it would shift and not charge.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Good price and works well
customer_reviews.text: Good price and works well. it comes with a wire which I wasnt aware of so all you need is a power brick or something to power it with. Have no problems with it on my iPhone X
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I need a charger that works all the time. This doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the price and reviewsz I put it to charge and I make sure it’s on green and 5 minutes later it on red. I have to keep checking it to make sure it’s on green. It’s annoying to keep coming back to make sure it’s charging.
customer_reviews.author: ECruz

customer_reviews.title: I love having a wireless charger!
customer_reviews.text: I keep this charger by my bedside and use it every night. I love it. It’s really easy to use because you don’t have to plug anything in and if I want to pick it up for a minute to look at something I don’t need to worry about having to plug it back in. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wireless charger
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wireless charger. I got one for my daughter to use with her iPhone 8 Plus and I liked it so much that I ordered one to use with my phone too. Perfect for our nightstands. Updated to add that I have now bought three of these chargers, they all work great and are so handy to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: They reached out to me both before and after receiving the order to make sure I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I I Purchased four items with this order the items from this vendor which was three all worked as described. The other item from another vendor was disappointing. The charger I bought far exceeded my expectations. The pink band that I purchased work perfectly. charging cables working perfectly. I would definitely purchase from this vendor again and advise everyone else to do the same. They reached out to me both before and after receiving the order to make sure I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ron  C

customer_reviews.title: Great price and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great price and does the job. Charges my wife's iPhone 8 even with the case on. Haven' noticed a "sweet spot" that it has to be on to charge either.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Esplin

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I ended up buying 3 for the 3 places I usually charge my phone. The old style required you to put something on the back of your phone to make it work. This one, you just lay you phone on it and the phone charges. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: none

product_meta.title: Yootech Wireless Charger Qi-Certified 10W Compatible with iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/Xs MAX/XR/XS/X/8/8 Plus, Galaxy Note 10/Note 10 Plus/S10/S10 Plus/S10E,5W All Qi-Enabled Phones(No AC Adapter)
feature_bullets: [7.5w, 10w and 5w wireless charging modes]:7.5W mode *Using QC2. 0/QC3. 0 adapter (9V, 1.67A) is ONLY compatible with iPhone XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/8 Plus; 10W mode *Using QC2. 0/QC3.0 adapter(9V, 1.67A) is ONLY for Samsung Galaxy S9/S9Plus/Note8/S8/S8Plus/S7/S7 Edge/S6 Edge plus/Note 5;5W mode *Using 5V, 2A adapter is for All Qi-enabled devices.

[Temperature control technology]:Exclusive multifunctional intelligent protect technology provides temperature control, surge protection, short-circuit prevention, and more. Ultra slim design plus intelligent temperature control system ensure your phone will not be too warm but charge more efficiently.

[Case friendly]:Yootech wireless charger can charge your phone with rubber/plastic/tpu cases within 4mm. If indicator light keeps blinking,please check phone's back(or case) is not attached with any iron, metal,coins,ic cards,bank cards, magnetic absorbers and other metal objects in the charging area including your phone case.

[Sleep-friendly]:Yootech smart indicator design is for your enjoying life more. You will not bother by the constant bright light shining throughout your room while charging. They will provide you a comfortable working and sleeping environment.

[Package & warranty]:You will get 1 x Qi Wireless Charging Pad, 1 x 3.3ft Micro USB Cable, 1 x User Manner. Hassle free 18 months money back/replacement warranty with 12-hour response service is friendly offered. At Yootech, ZERO Risk purchase guarantee is for every customer's smiles.
